name: Dead Army - Radio Frequency
description: Dead Army is a Real Time Strategy (RTS) game where the player takes control of an army of zombies. The player will be able to command each and every zombie in order to create the best strategy to raze military bases, villages and small towns.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 1.4 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1500 MB available space Additional Notes: Dead Army Radio Frequency is an Early Access game, and minimum specifications may change during development
